title: Research Assistant - Neuroscience Lab
description: Seeking undergraduate RAs for a study on memory and cognition. 10-15 hours/week during spring term. Stipend provided.

title: Volunteer Tutor - Hanover High School
description: Help local high school students with math and science homework. 2-4 hours/week. Great for education-minded students!

title: Summer Internship - Green Energy Startup
description: Join a Hanover-based clean energy startup for a 10-week summer internship. Work on solar panel efficiency research.

title: Barista - Dirt Cowboy Cafe
description: Part-time barista position at the beloved campus coffee shop. Flexible hours, free coffee, and great tips!
